title: Stock Trading Analyst
job_overview:
About Us
Trade Edge Pro is an American based stock alerts community that provides stock picks to medium term investors with a target maturity of 6-18 months per trade. Our alerts are hosted on our custom built app and include buy zones, sell targets, and the narrative supporting a stock. We focus on teaching traders about using stock charts over narrative and that you can in-fact time the market. 

We are also in the process of building a community using Circle.so where we can facilitate better group and 1-on-1 interactions with members, along with offering a full education course. 

Position Overview:
The Stock Trading Analyst will play a pivotal role in researching, charting, and posting potential trade ideas to our group. This position requires a deep understanding of market trends, technical analysis, and risk management strategies to make informed decisions. The successful candidate will be responsible for finding new trade ideas, creating attractive charts on TradingView, submitting information to our custom platform, and working with our social media team to alert our trades. 

Responsibilities:
Research
You will be responsible, alongside the Founder, for identifying stocks that fit our investment criteria using technical analysis.
Follow our current stock research methodology to find investment leads through FinViz, scanners, and social media 

Technical Analysis
Utilize technical analysis tools and methodologies to identify potential trading opportunities and create great looking charts for our members using TradingView. If you will also work with the Founder to convert his trading ideas into TV charts to share, so he has more time to grow the business. We primarily focus on support and resistance, trend lines, and use indicators as confluences for our trades but do not use indicators as the primary reasoning. 


Loading Alerts and Social Media 

You will be responsible for loading all new alerts in our custom app for our community by following our new stock alert procedure. You will work with our social media team to ensure that certain alerts are sent out to non-paying members on social media to generate a buzz for our services. 

Reporting and Documentation:
Track our alerts and their performance, including when targets are hit so that our social media team can promote our successful trades
Generate regular reports on trading performance, including profit and loss analysis
Maintain accurate records of trades, strategies, and market analyses
Provide insights and recommendations to optimize trading strategies

Collaboration:
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including technology, social media, and founder. 

Qualifications:
Experience:
Proven experience as a stock or crypto markets analyst and trader.

Skills:
Proficient in technical analysis tools and platforms.
Excellent quantitative and analytical skills.
Strong understanding of risk management principles.
Effective communication and collaboration skills.

Technology:
Familiarity with trading platforms and order execution systems

Pay Structure:
Pay is listed at $7.50USD per hour, but bonuses can be offered based on new community member sign ups to encourage teamwork in the right direction. 

Apply through Onlinejobs.ph and attached your resume or CV. Please mention a stock ticker in your application title so I know you read this post in depth, any stock ticker doesn't matter.
